title: MaxxHaul 70205 Trailer Light Kit - 12V All LED , Left and Right Waterproof Submersible for Trailers, Boat Trailer Truck Marine Camper RV Snowmobile
description: Maxxtow trailer light kits are built to meet or exceed DOT standards. Light kits are for trailers under 80 inches in width. Light kits (non magnetic) include 2 stop/tail/turn lights, 2 side marker lights, wiring harness and mounting hardware.
